Class KSurfacesApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jreality.tutorial.projects.ksurfaces.KSurfacesApp

  • public class KSurfacesApp
extends Object
    This class contains the application to display the K-surfaces and their Gauss map.
    Author:
    G. Paul Peters, 24.07.2009
